sentences.en: A cellulose nitrate used as a component of smokeless powder.
sentences.cn: 我们应该多吃一些富含纤维素的绿色蔬菜.

sentences.en: A third layer transverse cellulose strands is indicated as the microscope stage is rotated.
sentences.cn: 如将显微镜载物台旋转,便能从纤维横断面中看到第三层胞壁.

sentences.en: Acetate cellulose sheet electrophoresis and electric blotting proved it to be an α1 - globulin.
sentences.cn: 醋酸纤维膜电泳和转移电泳表明其为一种α1球蛋白.

sentences.en: Cellulose ether nitrate as novel energetic adhesive for solid propellant was synthesized.
sentences.cn: 以棉纤维为原料,合成了一种新型推进剂用含能黏合剂纤维素醚硝酸酯.

sentences.en: Cellulose is a very polyhydroxylated of long - chain - type structure of the polymer.
sentences.cn: 纤维素是带有好多羟基的不幼链环型布局的聚合物.

sentences.en: Cellulose is the major constituent of plant cell walls.
sentences.cn: 纤维素是植物细胞壁的主要成分.

sentences.en: Development of celluloses that are stable outside the cells of microorganisms enables the culturing of fungi and with yeasts on cellulose hydrolyzates.
sentences.cn: 开发在微生物细胞外部能稳定存在的纤维素酶使真菌和酵母在纤维素水解产物上培养有了可能。

sentences.en: Industrial wastes from the paper industry usually contain considerable amounts of cellulose in suspension.
sentences.cn: 造纸工业废水通常含有相当量的悬浮纤维素.

sentences.en: Most of the cellulose will settle to produce a sludge.
sentences.cn: 大部分纤维素沉淀生成污泥.

sentences.en: Other Ingredients : Dicalcium Phosphate , Cellulose ( Plant Origin ), Gelatin, Silica, Vegetable Magnesium Stearate.
sentences.cn: 磷酸二钙, 植物纤维, 凝胶, 二氧化硅, 植物硬脂酸镁.

sentences.en: Other Ingredients: Cellulose, di - calcium phosphate, magnesium stearate ( vegetable grade ).
sentences.cn: 其他成分: 纤维素, 二磷酸钙, 硬脂酸镁 ( 蔬菜级 ).

sentences.en: The linear glucan molecules of cellulose are bound together by hydrogen bonds.
sentences.cn: 纤维素中直链葡聚糖分子由氢键连接在一起.

sentences.en: The plant uses the carbohydrates to make cellulose.
sentences.cn: 植物用碳水化合物制造纤维素.

sentences.en: The rejected carbohydrate matter is cellulose and other higher polysaccharides.
sentences.cn: 排泄样的碳水化合物是纤维素和其它较高的多糖.

sentences.en: This bacterial decay of cellulose also occurs in the gut of most herbivorous animals.
sentences.cn: 在很多食草动物的肠内这种纤维素也能被细菌分解.

sentences.en: Various overlay mediums , such as agar , starchgel, methyl cellulose and tragacanth are used.
sentences.cn: 常用的覆盖培养基有:琼脂 、 淀粉凝胶甲基纤维素和黄蓍胶等.

words.tran_cn: 细胞性；多孔性；细胞结构

phrases.tran_cn: n. [化]醋酸纤维素；纤维素乙酸酯
纤维素钠；羧甲基纤维素钠

trans.tran_cn: 细胞膜质，纤维素，（用于制作涂料、漆等的）纤维素化合物
trans.tran_en: the material that the cell walls of plants are made of and that is used to make plastics, paper etc
